Name: Attack Noids
About the game: The terrible Attacknoids are trying to invade us! Eliminate them by bouncing the ball against them! Protect the different planets and finally travel to the Attacknoid's home planet where you will be able to destroy them forever! - Classic panoramic format - Retro style control mode - High quality HD graphics - Completely original graphics - Spectacular visual effects - 70 levels handmade designed - Ultimate boss at each planet round - Bonus and power-up options - Dozens of hidden references to classic science-fiction. Find them all! A game like those we played before, to have fun like children!
